markdownRemark.html:
Hello and welcome to my brand new website! I’ve been meaning to refresh my website for quite some time, and now I finally can say I have.

Stuff I Used to Make This Site

  • Gatsby is a really cool static site generator built with React.
  • gatsby-starter-blog is starter written by Kyle Matthews that has boilerplate for blogging, analytics, and much more.
  • Ant Design is an awesome React component library and design framework.
  • Netlify is a fantastic service for deploying websites.
  • namecheap is a great platform for buying domain names.

frontmatter.title: Welcome!
frontmatter.description: Welcome to my new website! Click here to see my first post!
